channel.title: Runescape private servers are illegal or legal?
channel.description: Hi.. i wanna know are the rs private server hosting and playing in it illegal or legal?

item.title: Runescape private servers are illegal or legal?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:9, topic:277361”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=366027.msg2776061#msg2776061 date=1241543564]

[code]Intellectual property rights
Jagex®, RuneScape® and FunOrb® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify any Jagex Product client software in any way (except to the extent allowed by applicable law). You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software or attempt to sub-license it. You must not create or provide any other means by which any Jagex Product may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).

Materials (including without limit all information, software, data, text, photographs, graphics, sound and video) placed on any Jagex Product by us or on our behalf are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights of ourselves or our business partners / suppliers / advertisers. You may not use these materials or any Jagex Product except in accordance with these terms and conditions and for personal (i.e. non-commercial) use only.

You agree that all intellectual property or other rights in any game character, account and items are and will remain our property.

By posting chat or other materials on any Jagex Product, you grant us a non-exclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty free, worldwide license to use and/or modify such materials on any Jagex Product as we see fit.

You agree that by submitting any material of any kind to us for any purpose connected with any Jagex Product (non-exhaustive examples are suggestions and ideas for any game or contributions to any Gallery page), you are giving us a non-exclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free license to use and/or modify the submitted materials as we see fit. You agree to waive any moral rights to the extent permitted by law and that you will not withdraw the submission or attempt to make a charge for its use. Furthermore you guarantee that you are the exclusive copyright holder in relation to the submission and that the submission in no way breaches the rights of any other person or entity.[/code]

To be honest hosting the server isnt illegal but the modified client IS.

if you have never played rs and agreed to those terms technically its not illegal and if it is why hasnt this site been shutdown?
[/quote]
Because of the TOS.[/quote]

TOS? whats that?

Read full topic

item.source: Runescape private servers are illegal or legal?

item.title: Runescape private servers are illegal or legal?
item.dc:creator: @ermo1515 ermo1515
item.description:
@ermo1515 wrote:

[quote=“mad_moparscapian, post:6, topic:277361”]Off topic:

Search on the Runescape forums for runescape private servers
Here is a thread i found quickly
http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?29,30,507,58698375

This is just one thread from Runescape, However if you search you will find millions…

On topic:
This can be considered as Illegal for Hosting private server’s However Playing them is Not illegal.
Runescape have Terms and Conditions That are an agreement you agree to when you create an account, However if you have never played runescape, You have never agreed to these Terms and Conditions so technically you’re breaking no laws.

Jagex has a highly trained team that is dedicated to finding and shutting down Runescape private servers, However most of the time they do not shut these servers down unless they are seemed as a threat to jagex.

There is a law about copyright and Copy right Infringements.

I hope i helped.[/quote]
yes it helps … thnx

Read full topic
